Articles.Content:
Hi there

I am having an issue with KSP and tried to find help with goggle. It pointed me to the forums, but when I follow the link I get a page saying I dont have permission even have registering and logging in.

Here is the link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74914-Maneuver-Nodes-Not-Acting-Properly

So how to read that page? (Or alternative how to query AND searches in the forums own search)

And since there might be a chance someone can help me directly I will decribe the actual problem in short here.

I am using the 64 bit Linux version 0.24.2 and my maneuver notes don't seem to act proberly. The direction and delta-v change over time without any force to the spaceship. In 0.23 I can't remember such problem.

Hi trickser,

We just recently (a little over a week ago) reorganized part of the forums. Google is pointing you toward an old post that has been put into the archives. (And I think the particular post you are trying to view wouldn't help with your situation anyway...)

What I recommend is that you check out this forum: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/76-Support-%28unmodded-installs%29 If you're using a modded version of the game, then you'll want to go here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/77-Support-%28modded-installs%29

That's the best place to put in requests for help about the game. You'll also want to check out this sticky thread to see what kind of information we need to help you. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Rather than trying to ask questions or trouble shoot the problem in this thread, I'm going to leave this information here so you can find it. Then I recommend you post your question (with some screenshots or other needed info) into the support forums. If we try to answer your question in here, it's likely to get forgotten about.

Welcome to the forums!

~Claw

Thanks for the welcome and the hints.

Just you did not answer my actual question, so let me reformulate it. How do I search the forums?

Neither google works nor using the forums own search as I can't connect my search terms with a logical AND. I guess there is no way then unless I missed something.

The forum search tool returns posts with all the terms, so there's no need for an AND operator.

You could also narrow down a Google search with the term site:forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com.
